branchCategory.name: VG342-X87, Residual Pressure Release Valve, ISO13849-1
branchCategory.description: <P>Special version of the VG series valve that conforms to ISO13849-1 safety standard, categories 1 to 4. These are dual residual pressure release safety valve with detection of main valve position.</P>
